Some talents require the vigilante to meet other prerequisites before they can be chosen, such as having another social talent or attaining a minimum vigilante level. Once a talent has been chosen, it cannot be changed.

entries.name: Soiling Touch
entries.description: At 1st level, you can impose the broken condition upon one Medium or smaller object by making a successful melee touch attack. Magical items or objects carried or worn by a creature are allowed a Fortitude save to resist this effect. Multiple uses of this effect do not stack. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Solar Ascension
entries.description: At 20th level, as a full-round action, you can become an incorporeal being of light for 1 round per sorcerer level. While in this form, you gain the incorporeal subtype and take half the normal damage from corporeal magic attacks (you take no damage from nonmagical weapons and objects). Your spells deal half damage to corporeal creatures, but spells and abilities that do not deal damage function normally. The duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-round increments. While in this form, any creature you move through (as the overrun combat maneuver) takes 2d6 points of fire damage.

entries.name: Solar Bloodline
entries.description:
Sorcerers who serve in the sun goddess閳ユ獨 court display powers infused with the glory of the sun itself.

  本职技能: Perception.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dnet1tyxbsnwailm]{灼热光辉} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.myeqz367l1vb5fje]{Fury Of The Sun} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oz41554bzacn8szb]{Shield Of The Dawnflower} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmugktarbieojt59]{焰击术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{法术强效},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.nWFr8SNcjcMqsXSH]{法术穿透}.

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a spell with the fire descriptor, if it deals damage, it deals +1 point of damage per die rolled.

entries.name: Solar Final Revelation
entries.description: At 20th level, yours becomes a journey without end. You cease aging, no longer suffer age-related penalties to ability scores, and cannot be magically aged. Any spells you cast of the conjuration (teleport) subschool or with the fire or light descriptor are automatically enlarged without affecting their spell level.

entries.name: Solar Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with this mystery adds Fly, Knowledge (geography), Linguistics, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{妖火} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lzos34s87qsc620l]{炽焰法球} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.evoz9r9n186nsjf0]{位面适应}n (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{燃烧之风} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lxxliyxfw9uvbxmt]{虹光法球} (18th).

entries.name: Solar Wind
entries.description:
You can unleash a blast of searing wind at a single target within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack with no range increment. Your solar wind deals 1d6 points of fire damage + 1 for every 2 oracle levels you possess.

  At 7th level, you can also knock an opponent back, treating the blast as a bull rush combat maneuver that uses your caster level + your Charisma modifier in place of your CMB.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Solid Ground
entries.description: The alchemist launches an explosive paste bomb that bonds with any earthen surface. Each application of this paste deals no damage and affects a 5-foot-cube of dirt, loose soil, or stone, transmuting the earth for a number of minutes equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 level. Creatures cannot use burrow, earthmeld, or similar abilities (such as the meld into stone spell) while the ground remains transmuted in this way.

entries.name: Solipsism
entries.description: At 20th level, you can drift into the dream world, fading from the world around you. You can become incorporeal for 1 minute per sorcerer level. You gain the incorporeal subtype and take only half damage from corporeal magical attacks (you take no damage from nonmagical weapons and objects). Your spells deal only half damage to corporeal creatures, but spells and abilities that do not deal damage function normally. The duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

entries.name: Solitude Subdomain
entries.description:
Replacement 领域法术:

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ow4t1zox6dtybgji]{沉默术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.viq93vkjaungdbul]{侦测探知}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.82vi1xife3nlu8a0]{海市蜃楼}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ngsn9j87t68uhysj]{Create Demiplane, Greater}

entries.name: Solo Tactics
entries.description: At 3rd level, all of the inquisitor閳ユ獨 allies are treated as if they possessed the same teamwork feats as the inquisitor for the purpose of determining whether the inquisitor receives a bonus from her teamwork feats. Her allies do not receive any bonuses from these feats unless they actually possess the feats themselves. The allies閳?positioning and actions must still meet the prerequisites listed in the teamwork feat for the inquisitor to receive the listed bonus.

entries.name: Song of Marching
entries.description:
At 3rd level, a skald can use raging song to inspire his allies to move faster without suffering from fatigue. By expending 1 round of raging song, the skald invigorates allies within 60 feet, who may hustle (Core Rulebook 170) for the next hour; this movement counts as a walk (not a hustle) for the purpose of accruing nonlethal damage and fatigue.

  The skald must continue to perform the song for the remainder of the hour, otherwise its effects end, but only 1 round of raging song is expended for that hour.

entries.name: Song of Strength
entries.description: At 6th level, a skald can use raging song to inspire his allies to superhuman feats of strength. Once each round while the skald uses this performance, allies within 60 feet who can hear the skald may add 1/2 the skald閳ユ獨 level to a Strength check or Strength-based skill check.

entries.name: Song of the Fallen
entries.description: At 14th level, a skald can temporarily revive dead allies to continue fighting, with the same limitations as raise dead. The skald selects a dead ally within 60 feet and expends 1 round of raging song to bring that ally back to life. The revived ally is alive but staggered. Each round, the skald may expend another 1 round of raging song to keep that ally alive for another round. The ally automatically dies if the skald ends this performance or is interrupted. The skald may revive multiple allies with this ability (either at the same time or over successive rounds) but must expend 1 round of raging song per revived ally per round to maintain the effect.

entries.name: Song-Bound Curse
entries.description:
(Merfolk only) Whenever you speak, you are compelled to sing loudly, and you draw out even short utterances with vocal scales or simple melodies. You cannot speak in less than a loud voice, although you may choose not to speak. You can perform the countersong bardic performance (using Perform [sing] only) for a number of rounds per day equal to your oracle level. If you gain the bardic performance class feature, these rounds are in addition to any other bardic performance rounds you gain, but they can be used only for the countersong bardic performance.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.2p6fzj5t03oivndd]{命令术} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术} to your list of spells known.

  At 10th level, add 1 to the difficulty class of saving throws against language-dependent spells you cast.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.l1zl69j95ad7l9dn]{Command, Greater} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{Suggestion, Mass} to your list of spells known.

entries.name: Songbird
entries.description: The vigilante gains the use of @Compendium[pf1.spells.0324zq42g3fu4kko]{动物信使} once per day as a spell-like ability, with a caster level equal to his character level. He also gains Handle Animal as a class skill.

entries.name: Sonic Blast
entries.description: The arcanist can loose a deafening blast of sonic energy by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir and succeeding at a ranged touch attack against any one target within 30 feet. The blast deals an amount of sonic damage equal to 1d6 + the arcanist閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier, plus an additional 1d6 points of sonic damage for every 2 levels beyond 1st (to a maximum of 10d6 at 19th level). The target is also deafened for 1 minute. The target can attempt a Fortitude save to halve the damage and negate the deafness.

entries.name: 安神
entries.description: 12级或以上的诗人能够通过表演造成等同于‘群体治疗重伤’的效果，并使用诗人的等级作为施法者等级。此能力会同时移除受影响的目标身上的疲乏、恶心和战栗效果。使用此能力需要4次连续的表演，且目标必须能够听到和看见整个表演过程。【安神】依赖声音和视觉成分运作。

entries.name: Soothsayer
entries.description:
The witch閳ユ獨 predictions become selffulfilling prophecies. When the witch uses the evil eye hex, fortune hex, misfortune hex, or retribution major hex, she can choose to delay the effect. If she does so, the hex takes effect the next time the target makes a roll that could be affected by the hex (such as an ability check, attack roll, saving throw, or skill check) or is affected by an action that could be modified by the hex (such as being attacked when the hex would affect the target閳ユ獨 AC), whichever comes first (ignoring actions that are not in combat and actions that have no penalty for failure). The duration of the hex begins on the same round as the action that causes it to take effect.

  The hex is wasted if it is not triggered within 24 hours.

entries.name: Sorrow Discipline
entries.description:
You draw strength from deep feelings of abandonment, loneliness, and sadness, turning these emotions into a powerful weapon or a barrier that protects you.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{圣域术} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ow4t1zox6dtybgji]{沉默术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.awia42zci8nufpfl]{回避侦测} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zt7cje76dck9hwp9]{极度绝望} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dlmeq0hpxfbjtibb]{心灵迷雾} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{摄心目光} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c3qqu6l3vdcfaoh7]{隔离术} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hi72gh3dlf7a1qyt]{迷宫术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.esia6azb5g68tfs7]{禁锢术} (18th).

entries.name: Soul of the Fey
entries.description: At 20th level, your soul becomes one with the world of the fey. You gain immunity to poison and DR 10/cold iron. Creatures of the animal type do not attack you unless compelled to do so through magic. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{行影术} as a spell-like ability using your sorcerer level as your caster level.

entries.name: Soul Siphon
entries.description:
As a ranged touch attack, you can unleash a ray that causes a target to gain one negative level. The ray has a range of 30 feet. This negative level lasts for a number of minutes equal to your Charisma modifier. Whenever this ability gives a target a negative level, you heal a number of hit points equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time at 11th level and every four levels thereafter.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: Soulbound Puppet
entries.description:
As a full-round action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to create a soulbound puppet from a bone, doll, or skull. If you use a bone or a skull, your power builds a Tiny or Small flesh puppet around it that vaguely resembles the original creature from which the bones were taken. If the implement is a doll, the doll comes to life. Treat this as a familiar, using your occultist level as your wizard level to determine its powers and abilities. By using a bone or skull from the appropriate creature or a doll shaped like that creature, you can select any of the familiar choices available to a wizard. You can instead use a humanoid bone, doll, or skull, to give the puppet the base statistics of a homunculus (Bestiary 176), but without a fly speed or the poison bite or telepathic link abilities. No matter the form, this creature is a construct with an alignment matching your own. You can have no more than one soulbound puppet active at any given time.

  The soulbound puppet remains animated for 10 minutes per occultist level you possess.

entries.name: Souls Subdomain
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8uwmrygxgih1fb57]{操纵死尸}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.76t09cafayrw13ux]{防活物护罩}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xmkvpl56appk20cl]{锢魂术}

entries.name: Soulstrider
entries.description: The arcanist can, as a swift action while he casts a spell that targets one living creature, spend 1 point from his arcane reservoir to infuse his spell with a manifestation of fiendish energy called a 閳ユ笩oulrider.閳?The soulrider attaches to the target of the spell and buries itself in the target閳ユ獨 subconscious mind, persisting there as long as the arcanist maintains at least 1 point in his arcane reservoir, until the arcanist dismisses the soulrider (this requires a standard action), or until the arcanist successfully infects another creature with a soulrider. The target of the spell can resist having the soulrider attach to its soul with a successful Will saving throw (this is in addition to any saving throw the spell itself might or might not allow). If the target resists the spell閳ユ獨 effects with a successful save or other methods (such as via spell resistance or by being immune to that spell閳ユ獨 effects) the soulrider automatically fails to attach to the victim. @Compendium[pf1.spells.uqh87jz757r2cb7r]{侦测魔法} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.tr7m97npkbgm4wp7]{侦测邪恶} can uncover the presence of a soulrider. As long as the soulrider persists, the arcanist can track the targeted creature as if it were under the effect of @Compendium[pf1.spells.4ya1fs9tyvsqnwqx]{关照术}, and the creature takes a 閳? penalty to any saving throw against a mind-affecting effect created by the arcanist. While the soulrider remains bonded to the target, the arcanist can spend 1 point from his arcane reservoir to communicate with the target as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.d0d86z521shpman1]{短讯术}. Soulrider is a mind-affecting effect.

entries.name: Soverignty Subdomain
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h8zit03e88jxrg9t]{严加斥责}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k8va0g2bqb8w31q6]{Castigate, Mass}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱}

entries.name: Space Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.97mcivnu2owb8119]{Mirror Strike}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.4gs8xrmzy2bvfkr0]{Twisted Space}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qmorw7eojkfqr00m]{闪现术}

  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.s0uh1psyg0cfd9e6]{Hostile Juxtaposition}
