If the vigilante is an avenger, he automatically confirms any critical hits threatened by his vengeance strike. If the vigilante is a stalker and would normally be able to add a special effect from a vigilante talent with an asterisk (*) to this attack, he can instead add two special effects to his vengeance strike.

entries.name: Venom Admixture Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type substance infusion; Level 2; Burn 2
Prerequisite venom speaker
Saving Throw see text

  You can infuse your kinetic blast with poison. To use this infusion, you must be holding a dose of poison or have at least one use of a feat or racial trait that produces poison (such as the Spit Venom feat or the toxic skin grippli alternate racial trait). One dose of poison or one use of your feat or racial trait is consumed if applicable, and creatures damaged by the infused blast are affected by the poison. Use the same type, save, save DC, frequency, effect, and cure as the consumed poison.

entries.name: 毒素免疫
entries.description: 9级开始，德鲁伊对所有毒素免疫。

entries.name: Venom Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type substance infusion; Level 4; Burn 3
Prerequisite venom speaker
Associated Blasts any simple or composite
Saving Throw Fortitude negates

  All of your blasts are mildly toxic. Creatures that take damage from your blast are sickened for 1 round.

entries.name: Venom Infusion, Greater
entries.description:
Element universal; Type substance infusion; Level 7; Burn 4
Prerequisite venom speaker, venom infusion
Associated Blasts any simple or composite
Saving Throw Fortitude negates

  This talent functions as the greater toxic infusion wild talent, except it affects any creature that takes any type of damage from the blast.

entries.name: Venom Speaker
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0

  You gain the investigator閳ユ獨 poison lore class feature, using your kineticist level as your investigator level, and can use your gather power ability even while holding a dose of poison in one of your hands or appendages as long as you could otherwise use that ability.

  If you are at least 6th level, you can learn the alchemist閳ユ獨 swift poisoning class feature or one of the following alchemist discoveries in place of a utility wild talent, using your kineticist level as your alchemist level: concentrate poison, poison conversion, or sticky poison.

entries.name: Venom Subdomain
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6gbb0vdil1e8mhou]{Pernicious Poison}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.im8z5kfg8ohowie9]{死云术}

entries.name: 剧毒唾液
entries.description:
以一个迅捷动作，你可以产生一剂窃命毒并将它涂在你的武器上。该毒素持续生效1分钟，或直到你以该武器成功伤害一个敌人为止。你每天可以产生毒唾的次数等同于3+你的感知调整值。此能力替换鳞类领域的剧毒瞪视能力。

  【窃命毒】：伤口传播；豁免检定：强韧检定DC=（10+1/2你的牧师等级+你的感知调整值）；发作频率：一次/轮，持续3轮；效果：1点体质伤害；治愈：通过一次豁免检定

entries.name: Venomous Stare
entries.description: As a standard action, you can activate a gaze attack with a 30-foot range (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 300). This is an active gaze attack that can target a single creature within range. The target must make a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier). Those that fail take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage + 1 point for every two cleric levels you possess and are fascinated until the beginning of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. This is a mind-affecting effect.

entries.name: Ventriloquism
entries.description:
As a swift action, the ninja can throw her voice as if using the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.0onqjy8gfgop1xsi]{腹语术}. She can use this ability for 1 minute per ninja level.

  Each use of this ability uses up 1 ki point.

entries.name: Verdant Apotheosis
entries.description: At 20th level, verdant power surges throughout your being. While bloodraging, you gain tremorsense out to 30 feet. In addition, you gain immunity to paralysis, poison, sleep, and stunning effects, even while you are not bloodraging.

entries.name: Verdant Bloodline
entries.description:
Your progenitors infused themselves with raw plant life, binding it into their own tissue and passing it down to their literal seed, giving you innate communion with nature.

  本职技能: Knowledge (nature).

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{纠缠术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.la7kuehewu85ybnt]{树肤术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rrsefzpm3nhztvld]{植物交谈} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wi9uvm8p12qvq616]{命令植物} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nqfoy30smshc3c6w]{Wall Of Thorns} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1i5uea24eq88q1kw]{木遁术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.sheso071mxbywlah]{植物形态 III} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qt0xmkag6ahtvesm]{活化植物} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bp4s030vn5iwwf58]{蔓生术} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.B6wEQOUMv2ifm2Nj]{神行步},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.lIlQnrRkC3YJ1V6t]{制造法杖},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BkKYCzEGNTzZRiTz]{快速移动},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.VMVAqGze4cs3naya]{灵狐步},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Knowledge [nature]),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}.

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a spell with a range of personal, your skin toughens, granting you a natural armor bonus equal to the spell閳ユ獨 level for 1d4 rounds. This bonus does not stack with any other natural armor bonuses you might have.

entries.name: Verdant Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
Your body is suffused with raw plant life. When you bloodrage, your plantlike characteristics bolster your durability and grant you some control over vegetation.

奖励专长：

  • Bolstered Resilience,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击}
  • Raging Vitality,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{纠缠术} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lviqtqs3y2ebkinr]{Greensight} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.auvsi3fenss2hga9]{Burst of Nettles} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wi9uvm8p12qvq616]{命令植物} (16th)

entries.name: Verdant Call
entries.description: At 12th level, when entering a bloodrage, as a swift action you can animate nearby plants to aid you in combat, functioning as @Compendium[pf1.spells.nxbk7s19aqjsrpba]{Wilderness Soldiers}, using your Charisma modifier instead of your Wisdom modifier. This effect lasts for as long as you continue bloodraging, regardless of the spell閳ユ獨 normal duration.

entries.name: Verdant Familiar
entries.description: The witch閳ユ獨 familiar閳ユ獨 creature type changes to plant, gaining all respective plant traits.

entries.name: Verdant Growth
entries.description: At 1st level, you gain fast healing 1 while bloodraging. Your fast healing increases by 1 at 4th level and every 3 levels thereafter, to a maximum of fast healing 6 at 19th level. If you have a bloodrager class feature that also grants you fast healing (such as the spelleater閳ユ獨 blood of life class feature), you can stack up to half of your fast healing from such abilities with the fast healing gained from this ability, but you cannot do so by an amount that exceeds your Charisma bonus (minimum 0).

entries.name: Verdant Path
entries.description:
Even the most tangled briars make way for the shaman, and suitable roots and branches appear to support her feet. The shaman gains woodland stride, as per the druid ability of the same name.

  At 8th level, she can use air walk at will whenever she is within 10 feet of a tree, though the effect ends instantly when she moves farther than 10 feet from a tree.

entries.name: Vermilion Wings
entries.description: At 9th level, you gain the ability to grow a pair of phoenix wings from your back as a standard action. The wings grant you a fly speed of 60 feet with good maneuverability. You can dismiss the wings as a free action.

entries.name: Versatile Comedy
entries.description: The powers of whimsy infuse your comedy with the ability to awe and befuddle. You can use your total Perform (comedy) bonus in place of your Bluff and Intimidate bonuses.

entries.name: 灵巧塑能
entries.description: 当你施展一个造成强酸、寒冷、电击或火焰伤害的法术时，你可以选择将它的伤害类型转化为以上四种元素伤害之一。这种变化会改变法术的描述符合新的能量类型。任何不造成伤害的效果依然不会被改变，除非它新的属性并无效果（一个被改变成火焰伤害的“冰风暴”依然因为烟雾对察觉检定有减值，但它并不会造成困难地型）。有些效果由GM决定。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等同于“3+智力修正”。

entries.name: 多才多艺
entries.description: 2级时，吟游诗人选定一种表演技能。他可以使用所选定的表演技能替代与其相关的技能检定。此时诗人使用他在那项表演上的全部技能加值，包括本职技能加值，以替代相关的技能加值——无论被替代的技能是否属于他的本职技能，以及他是否曾经受过那项技能的训练。在6级和之后的每4个等级，诗人都可以选定一项新的表演技能进行替换。表演技能与其相关的技能为：表演（演剧）－唬骗，易容；表演（滑稽）－唬骗，威吓；表演（舞蹈）－特技，飞行；表演（键盘乐）－交涉，威吓；表演（演讲）－交涉，察言观色；表演（打击乐）－驯养动物，威吓；表演（歌唱）－唬骗，察言观色；表演（弦乐）－唬骗，交涉；表演（管乐）－交涉，驯养动物。

entries.name: Versatile Performance (SAM)
entries.description: At 2nd level, the order of the songbird samurai gains the benefits of the bard閳ユ獨 versatile performance ability with one Perform skill.

entries.name: Vestige Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
You are the descendant of great heroes from a lost civilization.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BJBC4lbo7xGWPsKJ]{擅长异种武器}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.IER2MzJrjSvxMlNS]{高等武器专攻}*,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.asmQDyDYTtuXg8b4]{高等武器专精}*,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.YLCvMNeAF9V31m1h]{武器专精}*.

  (The bloodrager counts his total bloodrager levels as fighter levels for the purpose of qualifying for any feats marked with an asterisk [*]. If he also has levels in fighter, these levels stack.)

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xco22162bwgxn7pj]{克敌机先} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ze0kso9hxff5u2f]{虚假生命} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zpwd0f19q1lm04p3]{魅影驹} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.isfcr7k77gppxnwq]{Enlarge Person, Mass} (16th).

entries.name: Vestige Sorcerer
entries.description:
You trace your ancestry to a bygone civilization and can call upon its forgotten people or places for power.

  本职技能: Knowledge (history).

  奖励法术:@Compendium[pf1.spells.llxrra87kbofmyhl]{鉴定术} (3rd), @Compendium[pf1.spells.9hi94t05i449j5ul]{Share Memory} (5th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.2dc7e9wby8qpi6m0]{秘法视力} (7th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.pyr472hvqn8c8es2]{Hypercognition} (9th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.zuqlok69lapqc6lg]{心灵连线} (11th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.f2awecndqcmhavq7]{解析咒文} (13th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (15th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.gw2sgj93dgarpem8]{感知位置} (17th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.vl7yer8k1leyuxld]{预警术} (19th).

  奖励专长： @Compendium[pf1.feats.QvlxYVVsBDlykPKe]{奥术打击}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.7bJjKqNRrvpXJ4L3]{增强召唤}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.tD76K8QGco9scT0r]{制造奇物}, Echoing Spell, @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.R3a1OV18RwDJftvq]{领导力}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Knowledge [history]), @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻}.

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a spell of the divination school, you see into the past. You gain an insight bonus equal to the divination spell閳ユ獨 level on the next Appraise, Craft, or Knowledge skill check you attempt within 24 hours.

entries.name: Vestigial Arm
entries.description:
The alchemist gains a new arm (left or right) on his torso. The arm is fully under his control and cannot be concealed except with magic or bulky clothing. The arm does not give the alchemist any extra attacks or actions per round, though the arm can wield a weapon and make attacks as part of the alchemist閳ユ獨 attack routine (using two-weapon fighting). The arm can manipulate or hold items as well as the alchemist閳ユ獨 original arms (for example, allowing the alchemist to use one hand to wield a weapon, another hand to hold a potion, and the third hand to throw a bomb). The arm has its own 閳ユ笁and閳?and 閳ユ笧ing閳?magic item slots (though the alchemist can still only wear two rings and two hand magic items at a time).

  An alchemist may take this discovery up to two times.

entries.name: 无情锐爪
entries.description: 拥有这一绝技的猫族盗贼在使用她的爪子偷袭时可以将偷袭股从d6变为d8。选择这个绝技之前猫族盗贼必须拥有【猫爪】种族特性。

entries.name: Victory or Death
entries.description: At 20th level, you are immune to paralysis and petrification, as well as to the stunned, dazed, and staggered conditions. You have these benefits constantly, even while not bloodraging.

entries.name: Vigilante Specialization
entries.description:
At 1st level, a vigilante must choose to be either an avenger or a stalker.

An avenger gains a base attack bonus equal to his vigilante level instead of using those listed on Table 1閳?. He adds this value to any other base attack bonus gained from other classes or racial Hit Dice as normal.

A stalker gains an ability called hidden strike, which allows him to deal an extra 1d8 points of precision damage on melee attacks (or ranged attacks from within 30 feet) against foes who are unaware of his presence, who consider him an ally, or who are made flat-footed by startling appearance (see page 17). This extra damage increases by 1d8 at 3rd level and every 2 vigilante levels thereafter. A stalker vigilante can also deal hidden strike damage to a target that he is flanking or that is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC, but in these cases, the damage dice are reduced to d4s. A stalker can deal hidden strike damage against targets with concealment (but not total concealment).

Once this choice is made, it can閳ユ獩 be changed. While many vigilante talents are usable by both specializations, some are unique to each specialization. A stalker vigilante can apply only one talent marked with an asterisk (*) to a given hidden strike, and only when that hidden strike is dealt against a foe that is unaware of the stalker vigilante閳ユ獨 presence (or who considers him an ally), unless otherwise noted.

entries.name: Vigilante Talent
entries.description:
Starting at 2nd level and every 2 levels thereafter, a vigilante gains a vigilante talent. Unless otherwise noted, a talent can be selected only once. Some talents require the vigilante to meet prerequisites before they can be chosen, such as possessing another vigilante talent, possessing a particular specialization, or attaining a minimum level. Once a talent has been selected, it can閳ユ獩 be changed.

If the vigilante uses any of these talents while in his social identity, he must succeed at a Disguise check against the Perception checks of all onlookers (without the +20 circumstance bonus from seamless guise) or the onlookers will realize that he is more than his social identity appears to be and perhaps discover the social and vigilante identities are one and the same. If a talent calls for a saving throw, the DC for that save is equal to 10 + 1/2 the vigilante閳ユ獨 level + the vigilante閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier, unless stated otherwise.

entries.name: Vigilante's Reflexes
entries.description:
The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射} as a bonus feat. If he already has the Combat Reflexes feat, he instead gains another feat he qualified for at the level when he chose Combat Reflexes.

  At 8th and 16th levels, the number of additional attacks of opportunity per round the vigilante can make increases by 1, regardless of the vigilante閳ユ獨 Dexterity bonus.

entries.name: Viper's Breath
entries.description:
While holding a dose of poison in her mouth, the barbarian can exhale a 15-foot cone of inhaled poison. Anyone caught in the spray must succeed at a saving throw against the poison with a DC equal to the poison閳ユ獨 DC 閳?4 or suffer the poison閳ユ獨 effects with an immediate onset.

  A barbarian must have viper閳ユ獨 kiss to select this rage power.

entries.name: Viper's Kiss
entries.description:
The barbarian can drink 1 dose of an ingested poison as a move action (instead of a standard action) as long as she starts the turn with the poison in her hand. She can hold this dose within her mouth for a number of rounds equal to her Constitution modifier (minimum 1 round) without suffering harmful effects. If the barbarian still holds the poison in her mouth after this time, she consumes the poison. While the dose is held within her mouth, the barbarian閳ユ獨 next successful bite attack applies the effect of the poison with an immediate onset; this consumes the dose.

  A barbarian must have a bite attack (at least when raging, such as that granted by animal fury) to select this rage power.

entries.name: Viper's Touch
entries.description:
At 12th level, you grow two sets of venomous claws resembling the teeth of a serpent. These claws are primary natural attacks that deal 1d8 points of damage (1d6 if you are Small). The claws also gain the following poison ability: 

  Viper閳ユ獨 Venom: Claw閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC 10 + half the bloodrager閳ユ獨 level + the bloodrager閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1d3 Str damage; cure 1 save.

entries.name: Vision Hex
entries.description:
A witch with the vision hex can grant a glimpse of the future to a creature touched. Granting a vision takes 1 minute, during which time the witch and the target must remain in contact with one another. At the end of this time, the subject receives a brief image of the future, usually no more than 1 year from the time of the vision, subject to GM discretion. This is only one possible version of the future, making such visions unreliable at best. Most visions are slanted toward the alignment of the witch that granted them. For example, the visions granted by a chaotic evil witch often show scenes of death and destruction, while those of a neutral good witch tend to be of joyous events or occasions. A creature cannot be subject to another vision until the current vision has either come to pass or been prevented.

  A witch cannot use this ability on herself. Unwilling creatures receive a Will save to negate the vision.

entries.name: Vision of Blood
entries.description: When an enemy is struck by the subject, it believes its wound is far more severe, and the shock overwhelms it. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject hits with an attack using a weapon, a natural weapon, or an unarmed strike. The attack閳ユ獨 target must succeed at a Will saving throw or be stunned for 1 round. If the triggering attack was a critical hit, the target doesn閳ユ獩 get a saving throw.

entries.name: Vision of Iron
entries.description:
You can use any piece of polished metal at least the size of a dagger as a scrying device, as if using the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{探知}.

  At 15th level, this functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{Scrying, Greater}.

  You can scry for a number of rounds per day equal to your oracle level; these rounds do not need to be consecutive.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: 狂乱感知
entries.description: 你可以一个近战接触攻击，令一个生物获得一种狂乱感知效果。选择下列中的一项：攻击检定，豁免检定，及技能检定。目标在选定的项目上获得等同于你牧师等级一半（至少+1）的加值，同时其他两项受到相同大小的减值。此效果在3轮后结束。你每日可使用此能力的次数等于“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: Vision-Clouding Strike
entries.description:
The magus can expend 1 or more points from his arcane pool as a swift action to empower his weapon with shadowy energy that dissipates within 1 minute. A creature struck with the weapon must succeed at a Will save (DC = 1/2 the magus閳ユ獨 level + his Intelligence modifier) or treat the magus as being in an area of dim light for 1d4 rounds, plus 1 additional round for each arcane pool point expended. True seeing penetrates this effect, but darkvision and similar darkness-penetrating effects do not.

  The magus must be at least 9th level before selecting this arcana.

entries.name: Vital Punishment
entries.description:
The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.26k1Gi7t5BoqxhIj]{要害打击} as a bonus feat, though he does not have to meet the prerequisites for this feat. Once per round, before he makes an attack of opportunity, he can declare it to be a vital punishment. If the attack hits, the vigilante can apply the Vital Strike feat. The vigilante can apply the @Compendium[pf1.feats.DorPGQ2mifJbMKH8]{精通要害打击} or @Compendium[pf1.feats.zKNk7a4XxXsygJ67]{高等要害打击} feat as his vital punishment instead if he later gains those feats.

  A vigilante must be at least 6th level to select this talent

entries.name: Voice of Reason
entries.description:
The subject can more easily pierce sight-based illusions with the mesmerist閳ユ獨 aid. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject attempts a saving throw to disbelieve a sight-based illusion effect, but only so long as the mesmerist is not affected by or has disbelieved the illusion himself. The subject receives an insight bonus on her saving throw to disbelieve the illusion equal to the mesmerist閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier.

  This trick cannot be used for illusions that do not allow a saving throw.

entries.name: Voice of the Grave
entries.description:
You can @Compendium[pf1.spells.byn5q46du0ck592a]{死者交谈}, as per the spell, for a number of rounds per day equal to your oracle level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

  At 5th level, and every five levels thereafter, the dead creature you question takes a cumulative 閳? penalty on its Will save to resist this effect.

entries.name: Voice of the Wind
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0
Saving Throw none; SR yes

  When you whisper, you can have the wind carry your voice to the ears of anyone you can see within 120 feet, as if they were one of the targets of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.msaqovkgfxi6q8s8]{传讯术} spell you cast.

  Alternatively, you can send your voice to a distant location as if casting @Compendium[pf1.spells.v8czhud6wpmc9esu]{风讯术}.

entries.name: Voice of the Wind, Greater
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 2; Burn 0
Prerequisite voice of the wind

  Your voice of the wind ability gains both power and finesse.

  You can use voice of the wind to create unusual sounds, as ghost sound, to throw your voice, as ventriloquism,and even to alter your voice, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.26g4tysnax570dxo]{Vocal Alteration}. You can send messages at a much greater distance than before and at a faster rate. When using voice of the wind閳ユ獨 whispering wind effect, you can choose to have the wind rise high into the sky, where it can gust at 50 miles per hour before descending to deliver the message. While the gust is still small, abnormal wind that fast is noticeable, unlike the normal gentle zephyr from whispering wind. If you choose to use the faster gust, you can deliver a message as far as 50 miles per kineticist level, instead of 1 mile per kineticist level.

entries.name: Void Adaptation
entries.description: The shaman gains darkvision 60 feet. If she already possesses darkvision, the range instead increases by 30 feet. In addition, the shaman can see in supernatural darkness, is constantly under the effects of endure elements, and doesn閳ユ獩 need to breathe.

entries.name: Void Blessing: Airless Touch
entries.description:
At 1st level, with a successful melee touch attack you can steal the breath from an opponent閳ユ獨 lungs, leaving it unable to speak, use breath weapons, cast spells with verbal components, or do anything else requiring breath for 1 round. If the target fails at a Fortitude saving throw, it閳ユ獨 also staggered for 1 round as it catches its breath. If the target was attempting to hold its breath, it can no longer do so: it must breathe on its turn or risk suffocation and unconsciousness.

  Creatures that don閳ユ獩 need to breathe are unaffected.

  Regardless of whether it succeeds at its saving throw, the target is immune to further uses of your airless touch for 24 hours.

entries.name: Void Blessing: Deny Gravity
entries.description: At 10th level, as a standard action you can touch an ally to allow her to ignore the effects of gravity for 1 minute (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术}y). The ally gains a fly speed of 40 feet with average maneuverability. The ally is also immune to dangerous environmental conditions (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.f6lqt3ju8m7r5la2]{维生气泡}) for 1 minute.

entries.name: Void Bomb
entries.description:
By combining the spores from strange fungi with slivers from extradimensional voids, some drow alchemists create bombs that cause bursts of gravity capable of crushing those inside. Void bombs deals 1d4 points of bludgeoning damage, plus 1d4 points of bludgeoning damage for every 2 alchemist levels beyond 1st, instead of 1d6. A creature hit by the bomb must succeed at a Reflex save against the bomb閳ユ獨 DC. If it fails, it is knocked prone and can閳ユ獩 get up for 1 round. If it succeeds, all of its movement speeds are reduced to 5 feet for 1 round. Other creatures within 5 feet of the bomb閳ユ獨 target take no damage, but must succeed at a Reflex save against the bomb閳ユ獨 DC or have all their movement speeds reduced to 5 feet for 1 round.

  An alchemist must be 6th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Void Domain
entries.description:
神授力量: You can call upon the cold darkness between the stars to gain flight, travel to other worlds, or summon monsters from beyond to do your bidding.

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.68m9du7zw2di7ew6]{羽落术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.plou8h168bfn5hq6]{浮空术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.y4b1zmhmsa0gvf06]{Planar Binding, Lesser}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wqvy12w1xgk6l9b0]{翱翔天际}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3bdfw5f15hwcxlth]{反重力}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bbmd0fj17jsf5300]{Planar Binding, Greater}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.4qriqew7d2ot7wr5]{Interplanetary Teleport}

entries.name: Void Form
entries.description:
At 6th level, you can become semi-tangible as a standard action. While in this form, you are immune to critical hits and gain a +1 def lection bonus to AC. This bonus increases by 1 at 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Remote Viewing power of the Knowledge Domain.

entries.name: Void Healer
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 1

  This functions as kinetic healer, except it heals undead (and others healed by negative energy).

entries.name: Voidwalker
entries.description: At 3rd level, you gain low-light vision and resist cold and fire 5. At 9th level, you no longer need to breathe, as if wearing a necklace of adaptation.

entries.name: Volatile Arrows
entries.description:
A vigilante with this talent gains the ability to attach an alchemist bomb to a ranged attack he makes with a bow or crossbow as part of firing the attack. If the attack hits, it deals an additional amount of damage equal to that of an alchemist bomb, using the vigilante閳ユ獨 level as his alchemist level to determine the bomb閳ユ獨 damage. He can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + his Intelligence modifier.

  The vigilante can takes this talent multiple times. Each time he does, he can use the ability one additional time per day and he gains one alchemist discovery that can modify bombs, treating his vigilante level as his alchemist level for any prerequisites. He can apply these discoveries to his bombs as normal.

entries.name: Volcano Final Revelation
entries.description: At 20th level, the oracle閳ユ獨 body takes on the consistency of rock, and her touch carries the heat of a volcano. She gains the fire and earth subtypes and becomes vulnerable to cold. Any fire damage she deals ignores the first 10 points of fire resistance, but not fire immunity. The oracle gains a +4 bonus to natural armor. Her attacks with natural weapons, unarmed strikes, and metal-hafted weapons deal an additional 1d6 points of fire damage. Any creature that strikes the oracle with a natural weapon or unarmed strike, or that succeeds at a grapple combat maneuver check against her, takes 1d6 points of fire damage. This damage stacks with other sources of fire damage. You can suppress or reestablish this heat as a standard action.

entries.name: Volcano Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the volcano mystery adds Climb, Intimidate, Knowledge (geography), and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{燃烧之手} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3b1x69kfhnsa2d54]{灼热金属} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1vh2ewwvzvxunoxk]{防护能量伤害} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8qligfr61kotnlwx]{Volcanic Storm} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nll8ip8348eti0ff]{间歇泉} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0cbreqkr1vp7meyi]{游荡烈焰} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9wl8ijy6argdvz5f]{火焰风暴} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h17ad4lpmphnospf]{熔岩墙} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆} (18th).

entries.name: Volumizer
entries.description: The alchemist can use an extract slot of any level to create a reactive tablet that purifies water and doubles its volume. This works like purify food and drink for a maximum volume of water equal to 1 gallon for each level the alchemist has 鑴?the level of the extract slot the alchemist used to create the tablet. Additionally, if the alchemist has a receptacle of sufficient volume to gather the water, the tablet doubles the volume of pure water. The water volume increases over the course of 1 minute, but the effect stops before it can create significant water pressure on a container that閳ユ獨 not large enough to hold the entire volume. An unused tablet remains usable until the next time the alchemist recovers extract slots.

entries.name: Vortex fo Flesh
entries.description: At 9th level, you can momentarily change into an amalgam of erratic geometric shapes once per day, lashing out at every creature in a 20-foot-radius spread around you as a standard action. This attack deals 1d6 points of bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage per sorcerer level. If you benefit from a spell or effect that allows you to overcome damage resistance with your natural attacks (such as magic fang), this attack ignores DR of the same type. Those caught in the area can attempt a Reflex saving throw (DC = 10 + half your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier) for half damage. At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day. At 20th level, you can use this ability three times per day.

entries.name: Vortex Spells
entries.description:
Whenever you score a critical hit against an opponent with an attack spell, the target is staggered for 1 round.

  At 11th level, the duration increases to 1d4 rounds.

entries.name: Vortex Splash
entries.description: When in rain or waist deep in water, the vigilante can make a whirling splash as a full-round action, allowing him to attempt a single dirty trick combat maneuver or feint against each adjacent foe. The vigilante can make a separate choice for each target.

entries.name: Waking Dream
entries.description:
At 13th level, as a standard action, you can take control of the body of a sleeping creature within 30 feet for 1 hour per level. This ability functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.8ai7fslz4zu8xe9s]{魔魂壶}, except that your soul travels directly into the sleeping target with no receptacle necessary and the target creature閳ユ獨 consciousness remains dreaming and unaware of its body閳ユ獨 actions. When waking dream ends or the host body is destroyed, you immediately wake up in your body regardless of the distance from the host body, provided your body hasn閳ユ獩 been destroyed.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma bonus.

  Creatures that don閳ユ獩 dream are immune to this effect.

entries.name: Wall Climber
entries.description: A ninja with this ability gains a climb speed of 20 feet, but only on vertical surfaces. This ability cannot be used to scale perfectly smooth surfaces or to climb on the underside of horizontal surfaces.

entries.name: Wall Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 5; Burn 3
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  You create a wall of churning elements, flensing debris, or roiling energy. The wall appears within 30 feet and can be either up to 10 feet high and up to 120 feet long or up to 20 feet high and up to 60 feet long. All creatures and objects in one of the wall閳ユ獨 squares when you create it take 1/4 the normal damage from your blast with no saving throw (or half the normal damage for an energy blast). Anytime a creature crosses the wall, it takes half the normal damage from your blast (or full damage for an energy blast). The wall is not completely solid, but it does provide cover against attacks from the other side of the wall.

  The wall lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Constitution modifier or until you use a wall infusion again.

entries.name: 灰墙
entries.description: 到了8级，你能在100尺的距离内以飞灰为墙，此墙高20尺，长每牧师等级10尺。此墙阻挡视觉线，且生物经过时若未通过强韧豁免则失明1d4轮。灰墙会令里面和旁边的隐形生物显形，除非他们离开。你每天能使用的分钟等于牧师等级，不必连续。此能力取代火领域的火抗性能力。

entries.name: Wall of Power
entries.description:
By expending 1 point of mental focus as a standard action, you can create a wall of pure energy with a length of up to 5 feet per occultist level you possess. This wall is 10 feet high and 1 foot thick. It doesn閳ユ獩 block passage, line of sight, or line of effect, but does deal damage to anyone passing through it. The wall deals 2d6 points of energy damage + 1 point of energy damage per occultist level you possess. You must select acid, cold, electricity, or fire when you create the wall to determine the type of damage it deals. The wall must be straight, and can閳ユ獩 pass through a creature閳ユ獨 space when created. The wall lasts for 1 round per occultist level you possess.

  You must be at least 9th level to select this focus power.

entries.name: 翻墙者
entries.description: 在攀爬时，他可以骰两次攀爬检定并取其高值。如果其他的能力或法术提供他的攀爬检定骰两次取高的效果，那么他在这两次检定的结果上都得到+2的加值。若他的攀爬检定受到法术或能力影响，必须骰两次取低的话，他可以只骰一次攀爬检定并且接受该次掷骰的结果。

entries.name: Wand Mastery
entries.description: Whenever The magus uses a wand, he calculates the DC for any spell it contains using his Intelligence modifier, instead of the minimum modifier needed to cast a spell of that level.

entries.name: Wand Wielder
entries.description: The magus can activate a wand or staff in place of casting a spell when using spell combat.

entries.name: Wandering Hex
entries.description:
At 6th level, a shaman can temporarily gain the use of one of the hexes possessed by either one of her spirits. She must make this selection each day when she prepares her spells. For the purposes of this ability, she can select any hex possessed by her spirit or wandering spirit. If she selects it from her wandering spirit, she loses the hex immediately if she bonds with another spirit, although she can then select a different hex to gain using this ability, from either her spirit or her new wandering spirit.

  At 14th level, a shaman can select two wandering hexes each day instead of one. This ability otherwise functions as the hex class feature.

entries.name: Wandering Spirit
entries.description:
At 4th level, a shaman can form a temporary bond with a spirit other than the one selected using her spirit class feature. She must make this selection each day when preparing her spells. While this feature is active, she gains the spirit ability granted by the spirit. She also adds the spells granted by that spirit to her list of spells that she can cast using spirit magic. She does not add the hexes from her wandering spirit to her list of hexes that she can choose from with the hex class feature.

  At 12th level, she gains the abilities listed in the greater version of her wandering spirit.

  At 20th level, she gains the ability listed in the true version of her wandering spirit.

entries.name: War Blessing: Battle Lust
entries.description:
At 10th level, you can touch an ally and grant it a thirst for battle. All of the ally閳ユ獨 melee attacks are treated as if they had the vicious weapon special ability, but the additional damage dealt to the ally from that special ability is nonlethal. In addition, the ally receives a +4 insight bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits.

  These benefits last for 1 minute.

entries.name: War Blessing: War Mind
entries.description:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant it a tactical advantage for 1 minute. At the start of its turn each round, it can select one of the following bonuses:

  • +10 feet to base land speed
  • +1 dodge bonus to AC
  • +1 insight bonus on attack rolls
  • +1 luck bonus on saving throws

  Each bonus selected lasts for 1 round.

entries.name: War Domain
entries.description:
神授力量: You are a crusader for your god, always ready and willing to fight to defend your faith.

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cvv6oimqks9n62vy]{魔化武器}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.avofn5q2v0f0qxjy]{灵能武器}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{魔化防具}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0yvwyclhkf76veo1]{神能}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gmugktarbieojt59]{焰击术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z1j8oc2291czpinh]{剑刃护壁}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gado7zyg5knc83ir]{真言术 盲}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ol9newf4vrcx0kpf]{真言术 震}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.51ob5y7phwlhcuzz]{真言术 死}

entries.name: War Sight
entries.description:
Whenever you roll for initiative, you can roll twice and take either result.

  At 7th level, you can always act in the surprise round, but if you fail to notice the ambush, you act last, regardless of your initiative result (you act in the normal order in following rounds).

  At 11th level, you can roll for initiative three times and take any one of the results.

entries.name: War's Memory
entries.description: At 12th level, you can manifest an illusion of an ancestor閳ユ獨 bloody battlefield once per day. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.a2y1yf0a4jy3610w]{幻景}, except it can create only battlefields drawn from a civilization閳ユ獨 past, and the effect ends when your bloodrage ends. The saving throw to disbelieve is equal to 10 + 1/2 your bloodrager level + your Constitution modifier. The horrifying scene causes creatures within the area of effect to take a 閳? penalty on saves versus fear effects until they disbelieve the illusion. If a creature fails the Will save to disbelieve the illusion, it gains the shaken condition until your bloodrage ends, or until it leaves the area of effect. This is an illusion (glamer) and fear effect.

entries.name: Ward
entries.description:
The shaman places a protective ward over one creature. The warded creature receives a +2 deflection bonus to AC and a +2 resistance bonus on saving throws. This effect lasts until the warded creature is hit or fails a saving throw. A shaman knows when a warded creature is no longer protected. A shaman can have only one ward active at a time. If the shaman uses this hex while a previous ward is still active, that previous ward immediately ends. A shaman cannot use this ability on herself.

  At 8th and 16th levels, the bonuses provided by this ward increase by 1.

entries.name: 防护死亡
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以放出30英尺的灵光，每日可用轮数等于你的牧师等级。此区域内活着的生物获得免疫所有死亡效果、能量吸取、及造成负向等级的效果。此防护效果并不移除生物已获得的负向等级，但这些负向等级在生物处于防护灵光范围内时并不生效。每日可用轮数可分作多次使用。

entries.name: Ward Hex
entries.description:
A witch can use this hex to place a protective ward over one creature. The warded creature receives a +2 deflection bonus to AC and a +2 resistance bonus on saving throws. This ward lasts until the warded creature is hit or fails a saving throw. A witch knows when a warded creature is no longer protected. A witch can have only one ward active at a time. If the witch uses this ability again, the previous ward immediately ends.

  A witch cannot use this ability on herself.

  At 8th level and 16th level, the bonuses provided by this ward increase by +1.

entries.name: Ward of Flames
entries.description:
The shaman touches a willing creature (including herself ) and grants a ward of flames. The next time the warded creature is struck with a melee attack, the creature making the attack takes 1d6 points of fire damage + 1 point of fire damage for every 2 shaman levels she possesses. This ward lasts for 1 minute, after which it fades away if not already expended.

  At 8th and 16th levels, the ward lasts for one additional attack.

  A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

entries.name: Ward of Stone
entries.description:
The shaman touches a willing creature (including herself ) and grants a ward of stone. The next time the warded creature is struck with a melee attack, it is treated as if it has DR 5/adamantine. This ward lasts for 1 minute, after which it fades away if not already expended.

  At 8th and 16th levels, the ward lasts for one additional attack.

  A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

entries.name: Warding Rune
entries.description:
At 6th level, when a creature is damaged by your blast rune, it cannot attack you for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level unless it succeeds at a Will save, as per the spell sanctuary. Using this ability is an immediate action when a creature triggers one of your blast runes. The ability does not prevent you from being attacked or affected by area of effect spells or abilities. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day at 14th level and 20th level.

  This power replaces the Spell Rune power of the Rune Domain.

entries.name: Warding Talisman
entries.description: The implement wards against adverse effects. Whoever wears (or holds, for bells) the implement gains a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws for every 2 points of mental focus invested in the implement, to a maximum bonus of 1 + 1 for every 4 occultist levels you possess.

entries.name: Wards of the City
entries.description:
The spirit of the city shrouds one creature the shaman touches from the hazards of the slums. The warded creature gains a +5 bonus on saves against disease and poison, and a +25% bonus on percentage chances to negate critical hits and sneak attacks. (This stacks with effects such as fortification, or abilities that grant a creature with no chance to negate critical hits a flat 25% chance.) Each time the ward is used (whether the roll is successful or not), the bonuses are reduced by 1 and 5%, respectively. The ward ends when the bonuses are reduced to 0, when the shaman wards a new creature, or after 24 hours, whichever comes first. At 8th level and 16th level, the ward閳ユ獨 starting bonuses increase by 2 and 10%, respectively.

  A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

entries.name: Wards Subdomain
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cqhabnit3b7l5ezm]{秘法锁}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0vmz2klcfvkc3h0v]{次元锚}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8z4tlk1fojr9t9yb]{铜墙铁壁}

entries.name: Warlord Reborn
entries.description: At 20th level, you become a true orc warlord of legend. You gain immunity to fire and DR 5/閳? Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术} as a spell-like ability using your sorcerer level as your caster level.

entries.name: Warp Discipline
entries.description:
Ratfolk mythology claims they were appointed by the gods to sniff out the ragged edges of creation. Whether the art of ranatagi descended from this glorious role or formed the source of such myths, this psychic tradition among the ratfolk of Vudra and eastern Casmaron unlocks the psychic potential in trainees, teaching them to sniff out folds and tears in reality. Ancient practitioners of ranatagi even claimed that the art once allowed ratfolk to guide great caravans to the stars.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja005kj1gh7g0dnk]{熵光护盾} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kdnkszyxk0a7n62w]{Apport Object} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.r190q9zxmei82lmv]{移位术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.k3zn13pbr5tr9zac]{驱逐术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5cdmojmydhwowzy1]{Teleport, Greater} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ef75tkrzjuotgra2]{次元锁} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4qriqew7d2ot7wr5]{Interplanetary Teleport} (18th).

entries.name: Warp Wood
entries.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0

  You can bend and twist plants and wooden objects. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.mt3gozaeg6qqy180]{曲木术}.

entries.name: Warped Brain
entries.description:
At 5th level, your mind becomes difficult to comprehend. When another creature uses a mind-affecting spell or ability against you, that creature must attempt a Will save. If it fails, it becomes nauseated for 1 round.

  This ability triggers even if you succeed at your save (or are otherwise unaffected by the spell or ability), but doesn閳ユ獩 apply if you閳ユ獧e a willing subject of the spell. This is a mind-affecting effect.

entries.name: Warpriest Aura
entries.description: A warpriest of a chaotic, evil, good, or lawful deity has a particularly powerful aura (as a cleric) corresponding to the deity閳ユ獨 alignment (see detect evil on page 266 of the Core Rulebook for details).

entries.name: Warrior's Discipline
entries.description: At 1st level, you tap into untold generations of battle experience to control your battle fury. As a swift action, you can halve any morale bonuses gained from bloodrage to be able to use Intelligence- or Charisma-based skills, or any abilities requiring patience or concentration. This effect lasts for 1 round.

entries.name: Wasting Curse
entries.description:
Your body is slowly rotting away. You take a 閳? penalty on Charisma-based skill checks, except for Intimidate. You gain a +4 competence bonus on saves made against disease.

  At 5th level, you are immune to the sickened condition (but not nauseated).

  At 10th level, you gain immunity to disease.

  At 15th level, you are immune to the nauseated condition.

entries.name: Wasting Ray
entries.description: At 1st level, as a standard action, you can impose either starvation or thirst upon a living creature you can see within 30 feet. This requires the creature to make a Constitution check each round (DC 10 + 1 for each previous check) to avoid taking 1d6 points of nonlethal damage. The creature must continue to make these checks until, as a full-round action, it quenches its thirst or sates its hunger (see starvation and thirst). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier, but can only apply it once every 24 hours to any given creature. Creatures that do not need to eat are immune to this effect.

entries.name: Watchful Eye
entries.description:
You can expend 1 point of mental focus as a standard action to create an invisible sensor within 30 feet that watches a 5-foot-square area. Whenever any creature enters that square, you receive a mental image of the creature as long as you are on the same plane as the sensor.

  The sensor remains active for 10 minutes per occultist level you possess. The image will not wake you from slumber, although you do receive all of the images the sensor collected once you wake up. The sensor can be deceived by invisibility and similar magic.

  You can expend additional points of mental focus when creating the eye to increase the size of the square by 5 feet per additional point spent (to 10 feet square, 15 feet square, and so on).

entries.name: Water Adaptation
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can turn fresh water into seawater, and vice versa. This can affect a volume of water equal to 2 gallons per kineticist level, allowing sea creatures to survive in water that was fresh and freshwater creatures to survive in water that was briny.

  Additionally, when you alter water閳ユ獨 salinity with this talent, you can adjust the water閳ユ獨 temperature so that a creature can survive in it more easily (or simply be more comfortable). Water altered in this way must be confined within an appropriately sized container; attempts to alter a larger quantity of water fail.

entries.name: Water Blessing: Armor of Ice
entries.description: At 10th level, you can touch any one ally and wreath it in freezing mist. This works as @Compendium[pf1.spells.nfm6i9z9r3n2fku7]{火焰护盾} (chill shield only) with a duration 1 minute.

entries.name: Water Blessing: Ice Strike
entries.description:
At 1st level, you can touch one weapon and enhance it with the power of water. For 1 minute, this weapon glows with a blue-white chill and deals an additional 1d4 points of cold damage with each strike.

  This additional damage doesn閳ユ獩 stack with the additional damage from the frost or icy burst weapon special abilities.

entries.name: Water Domain
entries.description:
神授力量: You can manipulate water and mist and ice, conjure creatures of water, and resist cold.

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7m5us8d4a9lwh1ap]{水中呼吸}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{操纵水位}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{冰风暴}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pkm8um5t1cxsn6jh]{寒冰锥}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{元素形态 IV} (water only),
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pfy97qyneoa391ek]{元素集群} (water spell only).

entries.name: Water Form
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can assume the form of a Small water elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.pawbnw1nm4f0b98e]{元素身躯I}.

  At 9th level, you can assume the form of a Medium water elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.yldjnorgbx4jsldz]{元素身躯II}.

  At 11th level, you can assume the form of a Large water elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd32fuc6e7j4isbn]{元素形态 III}.

  At 13th level, you can assume the form of a Huge water elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{元素形态 IV}.

  You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 1 hour/level.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: Water Lung
entries.description: An air-breathing target can breathe water or an aquatic target can breathe air. This lasts 1 minute. If the witch uses this hex on herself, she can maintain it while she sleeps, allowing her to safely sleep underwater.

entries.name: Water Manipulator
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0
Prerequisite kinetic cover
Saving Throw none; see text; SR no

  You can manipulate massive quantities of water. As a standard action, you can raise or lower the level of water as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{操纵水位}, or move an amount of water equal to 1/1,000th the amount controlled by that spell to a different location in range. The water remains where you placed it for as long as you remain motionless and take a standard action each round to concentrate on this effect. This wild talent causes a slow effect on creatures made of water, just like control water (Will negates).

  When you cease concentrating, the water flows normally unless you accept 1 point of burn to extend the duration and hold the water in its current position for 10 minutes per kineticist level you possess.

entries.name: Water Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cyzbticmitktat5v]{祝福圣水}/@Compendium[pf1.spells.c0hvjnqzry149ugs]{诅咒邪水}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7m5us8d4a9lwh1ap]{水中呼吸}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{操纵水位}

  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hd32fuc6e7j4isbn]{元素形态 III} (water only),
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{元素形态 IV} (water only),
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.o4rwtizvdj7216qd]{水幕天华}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ltda70etgwje43x6]{津波}

entries.name: Water Sense
entries.description: The barbarian閳ユ獨 senses are no longer fooled by the rippling surface and confounding reflections seen in water that is being used as cover by her foes. While the barbarian is raging and on land, opponents in the water gain only partial cover from her attacks, instead of improved cover. In addition, while on land and targeting an opponent in water, she takes only a 閳? penalty on attacks with ranged weapons (including thrown weapons) for every 5 feet of water they pass through (instead of the usual 閳? penalty for every 5 feet of water).

entries.name: Water Sight
entries.description:
You can see through fog and mist without penalty as long as there is enough light to allow you to see normal.

  At 7th level, you can use any calm pool of water at least 1 foot in diameter as a scrying device, as if using the @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{探知} spell.

  At 15th level, this functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{Scrying, Greater}.

  You can use the scrying abilities for a number of rounds per day equal to your oracle level, but these rounds do not need to be consecutive.

entries.name: Water Sprint (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ki power can spend 1 point from his ki pool as a swift action to gain the ability to walk on water, as if under the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.g2obld7y0lpyztes]{水面行走}. Once activated, this ability lasts for 1 minute per monk level.

  A monk must be at least 6th level before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: Water Totem
entries.description: While raging, the barbarian can breathe water as well as air.

entries.name: Water Totem, Greater
entries.description: While raging, the barbarian gains tremorsense to a range of 30 feet while underwater. She can attack and move underwater as if affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如}.

entries.name: Water's Fury
entries.description: At 9th level, you gain the ability to summon a rushing jet of water from the elemental plane of water and direct it against your foes. As a standard action, you can create a jet of water in a 60-foot line that deals 1d6 points of damage per two sorcerer levels you possess, and blinds the target that was struck for 1d6 rounds. A Reflex save (DC 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Charisma bonus) reduces the damage by half and negates the blinding effect.

entries.name: Waterdancer
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0

  You call forth a current of water to increase your speed and allow you to swim with ease, as if under the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术} with unlimited duration.

entries.name: Waterdancer, Greater
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Su); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite waterdancer

  You can move across water (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.g2obld7y0lpyztes]{水面行走}) at will and breathe underwater, and your slashing and bludgeoning attacks don閳ユ獩 take the usual penalties when you閳ユ獧e underwater.

entries.name: Watersense
entries.description:
At 8th level, you gain tremorsense with a range of 30 feet in water.

  At 12th level, you instead gain tremorsense with a range of 60 feet when in water.

entries.name: Watersense, Greater
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Su); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite watersense

  You project your watersense outward through the tides and water around you, allowing you to spy on others at a distance. You can take 10 minutes to project your senses, choosing a location within 480 feet that is connected to your current location via the same continuous body of water, or you can take 1 hour to attempt to spy on a specific creature within 1 mile per kineticist level that is visible from a location connected to your current location via the same continuous body of water. In the latter case, the creature receives a Will save as per scrying (including bonuses and penalties based on connection and knowledge); a target that saves is immune to your greater watersense for 24 hours. In either case, an extremely thin funnel of water, lasting for 1 minute per kineticist level, carries light and sound to your location, where your target area or location appears in the water next to you and you can view it as if through a scrying sensor, allowing you to both see and hear the area immediately surrounding the other end of the funnel. In the case of a distance greater than 480 feet, the sound comes 1 round later than its corresponding visual information for every mile away you are (for instance, if you were 5 miles away, you would see your target start talking 5 rounds before you heard what it said). When you are tracking a creature, the funnel moves as best it can through the water to follow that creature, up to 150 feet per round, but the target can escape by simply moving away from the water.

  If you also possess the voice of the wind wild talent, you can use its message effect to send your voice through the funnel with a delay of 1 round per mile. This wild talent is a divination and scrying effect.

entries.name: Wave of Gloom
entries.description:
At 5th level, by expending 1 use of your despair ability as a standard action, you can project a strong feeling of dejection. All creatures within 30 feet of you must succeed at a Will save or take a penalty on attack rolls, saves against fear effects, and skill checks for 1d4 minutes. The penalty is equal to (but doesn閳ユ獩 stack with) the penalty provided by your despair ability. The DC of the saving throw equals 10 + half your psychic level + your Charisma modifier.

  You閳ユ獧e immune to your own wave of gloom. This is a mind-affecting emotion effect.

entries.name: Wave Strike
entries.description:
As a standard action, the shaman can perform a melee touch attack that drenches a creature and pushes it away. The opponent takes 1d6 points of nonlethal damage + 1 point for every 2 shaman levels they possess and is pushed 5 feet directly away from the shaman. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

  A shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.

  At 11th level, any melee weapon she wields is treated as if it had the quenching weapon special ability.

entries.name: Wavedancer
entries.description: At 12th level, your bloodrage directs the flow of water to assist you in battle. While underwater, your reach increases by 5 feet and you gain the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{加速术}.

entries.name: Waverider
entries.description: At 2nd level, the cavalier gains a swim speed equal to his unmodified base land speed. If he already has a swim speed, his swim speed increases by 10 feet, and if he and his mount both have a swim speed, the mount閳ユ獨 swim speed also increases by 10 feet. He gains a +1 morale bonus on damage rolls when underwater.

entries.name: Waves Final Revelation
entries.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a master of cold and water. You can apply any one of the following feats to any cold or water spell without increasing the level or casting time: @Compendium[pf1.feats.9mcYid7xJY9NiySx]{法术增远}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发}, or @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{法术定发}.

entries.name: Waves Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the waves mystery adds Acrobatics, Escape Artist, Knowledge (nature), and Swim to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ts50hpvkdgerfp1a]{海洋之触}a (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7m5us8d4a9lwh1ap]{水中呼吸} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijui94bv4uzu8awb]{Wall Of Ice} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nll8ip8348eti0ff]{间歇泉} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tpid8izzs2rrfxv3]{漩涡之流} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.o4rwtizvdj7216qd]{水幕天华} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ltda70etgwje43x6]{津波} (18th).

entries.name: Waves Spirit
entries.description:
A shaman who selects the waves spirit has a fluid grace that exhibits itself whenever she moves. When she calls upon one of this spirit閳ユ獨 abilities, floating orbs dance about her, sublimating between icy crystals, misty vapors, and globules of water.

Spirit Magic Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ohy0ty2dawfaaqwd]{水流冲击} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7m5us8d4a9lwh1ap]{水中呼吸} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijui94bv4uzu8awb]{Wall Of Ice} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nll8ip8348eti0ff]{间歇泉} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h4nlrm44ubsyzuhz]{液体形态} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tpid8izzs2rrfxv3]{漩涡之流} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.o4rwtizvdj7216qd]{水幕天华} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ltda70etgwje43x6]{津波} (9th)

  Spirit Animal: The skin of the shaman閳ユ獨 spirit animal constantly distorts, much as a pond閳ユ獨 surface ripples when drops of water fall gently into it. The animal gains Mobility as a bonus feat. The animal doesn閳ユ獩 need to meet the prerequisites for this feat. In addition, the animal can breathe underwater.

entries.name: Waves Spirit Mastery
entries.description: Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes a master of cold and water. The shaman gains cold resistance 30. She can also apply any one of the following feats to any cold or water spell she casts without increasing the spell閳ユ獨 level or casting time: Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Silent Spell, or Still Spell. She doesn閳ユ獩 need to possess these feats to use this ability.

entries.name: Waxen Image
entries.description:
The witch can spend a full-round action to create a crude and unnerving wax duplicate of a creature she can see within 30 feet. Once the image is complete, the subject must make a Will save. If the subject fails, the witch gains a small measure of control over the creature. Whenever she exercises this control, the creature receives a new Will save to end the effect. This effect occurs on the witch's turn and does not impede the creature's actions on its turn.

  The witch can use the waxen image a number of times equal to her Intelligence modifier before it melts.

  As a standard action, the witch can cause the subject to do any one of the following things: move up to the creature's speed in any direction, attack itself once with any weapon in hand (this attack automatically hits), lay down on the ground, or drop anything held.

  Alternatively, she can spend one of her uses to simply torture the image, causing the creature to be both sickened and staggered on its turn. As soon as the creature has succeeded on a saving throw against this effect, it is immune to it for 24 hours. The is an enchantment (compulsion) effect.

entries.name: Way of the Samurai
entries.description: At 8th level, the order of the warrior samurai's sense of honor and loyalty drives him to accomplish seemingly impossible tasks. The samurai can, as a standard action, focus his mind and will. Once during the next minute, he can choose to roll an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw three times and take the best result. He must decide to use this ability before the roll is made. Using this ability expends one daily use of his resolve.

entries.name: Weapon Expertise
entries.description: At 3rd level, a samurai gains an unparalleled expertise with his chosen weapons. At 3rd level, the samurai selects either the katana, longbow, naginata, or wakizashi. The samurai can draw the selected weapon as a free action as if he had the @Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{即时备战} feat. In addition, whenever he threatens a critical hit with the selected weapon, he gains a +2 bonus on the confirmation roll. Finally, his samurai levels count as fighter levels and stack with any fighter levels he possesses for the purposes of meeting the prerequisites for feats that specifically select his chosen weapon, such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.YLCvMNeAF9V31m1h]{武器专精}.

entries.name: Weapon Familiarity
entries.description:
The vigilante selects either two simple or martial weapons or one exotic weapon when he gains this talent. He gains proficiency with his chosen weapon or weapons.

  At 8th level, he also gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻} as a bonus feat for his selected weapon or weapons.

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.

entries.name: 武器大师
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以通过迅捷动作获得一个战斗专长的使用能力，每日可用轮数等于你的牧师等级。你可以分做多次使用，并且每次使用本能力时都可以改变选择的专长。但你必须满足使用该专长的先决条件。

entries.name: 武器宗师
entries.description: 在第20级，战士可以选择一种武器——例如长剑、巨斧或长弓——任何由此武器做出的攻击，重击确认自动成功，并且重击时的伤害倍率将会额外加1。并且，当他手持此类武器时不会被卸武。

entries.name: 抢夺武器
entries.description: 拥有此天赋的盗贼在进行卸除武器战技检定的时候，可以使用巧手检定取代战技检定。

entries.name: 武器训练
entries.description: 5级时，战士可以选择一个下面所标注的武器类组。当他使用该类组的武器时，他在命中与伤害上获得+1加值。在这之后的每4级（9、13跟17），战士可以选择一个新的武器类组来进行更多的训练。他同样在该武器类组的命中与伤害上获得+1加值，并且，当他使用先前所选择训练的类组武器时，他的命中跟伤害加值会额外+1。例如说，有一位战士升到了9级，他在一个武器类组的命中与伤害上获得+1加值，并在另外一个（他5级时选择的那个）武器类组的命中与伤害上获得+2加值。如果两个武器类组同时包含了一个武器，那么加值并非叠加，而是取两个类组中加值较高的那一个。

entries.name: 武器训练
entries.description: 5级时，战士可以选择一个下面所标注的武器类组。当他使用该类组的武器时，他在命中与伤害上获得+1加值。在这之后的每4级（9、13跟17），战士可以选择一个新的武器类组来进行更多的训练。他同样在该武器类组的命中与伤害上获得+1加值，并且，当他使用先前所选择训练的类组武器时，他的命中跟伤害加值会额外+1。例如说，有一位战士升到了9级，他在一个武器类组的命中与伤害上获得+1加值，并在另外一个（他5级时选择的那个）武器类组的命中与伤害上获得+2加值。如果两个武器类组同时包含了一个武器，那么加值并非叠加，而是取两个类组中加值较高的那一个。

entries.name: Weapon Training (2 pts)
entries.description: An eidolon learns to use a weapon, gaining @Compendium[pf1.feats.y3GhqdsCdE9IyYQc]{擅长简易武器} as a bonus feat. If 2 additional evolution points are spent, it gains proficiency with all martial weapons as well.

entries.name: Weapon Training (UC)
entries.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻} as a bonus feat.

entries.name: Weapon Training (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
The eidolon learns to use a weapon, gaining Simple Weapon Proficiency as a bonus feat.

  If 2 additional evolution points are spent, it gains proficiency with all martial weapons as well.

entries.name: Weather Blessing: Storm Strike
entries.description:
At 1st level, you can touch one weapon and grant it a blessing of stormy weather. For 1 minute, this weapon glows with blue or yellow sparks and deals an additional 1d4 points of electricity damage with each hit.

  This additional damage doesn閳ユ獩 stack with the additional damage from the shock or shocking burst weapon special abilities.

entries.name: Weather Blessing: Wind Barrier
entries.description: At 10th level, you can create a barrier of fast winds around yourself for 1 minute. This acts as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhd6734dulevnwef]{风墙术} on all sides of your square, protects you with @Compendium[pf1.spells.68m9du7zw2di7ew6]{羽落术}, and doesn閳ユ獩 interfere with your ranged attacks.

entries.name: Weather Control
entries.description: A witch with this hex can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气} once per day, but creating the weather takes 1 full hour of chanting, dancing, and communing with her familiar.

entries.name: Weather Domain
entries.description:
神授力量: With power over storm and sky, you can call down the wrath of the gods upon the world below.

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.rrheoc0h80mbss7z]{召雷术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qnp4eosajai8s3sf]{雪风暴}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{冰风暴}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g9koefk7x9szoheo]{操纵风相}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.i9greyz3c0ap32vi]{旋风术}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{复仇风暴}

entries.name: Weather Master
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 8; Burn 0

  By focusing on your connection to air and seeding the air around you for 10 minutes, you can create powerful weather effects, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气}. You can create tornadoes or hurricane-force winds, as appropriate for the season.

  If you have access to the fire element, you can create hot weather, a heat wave, a thaw, or an early spring.

  If you have access to the water element, you can create all other types of weather listed in control weather.

entries.name: Weather Sage
entries.description: If she spends 1 point from her arcane reservoir, the arcanist can predict the weather in her current location for the next 24 hours. The arcanist閳ユ獨 prediction is always accurate, but it cannot account for spells or supernatural effects that might alter conditions. In addition, she gains a bonus equal to half her arcanist level on Fortitude saves against severe weather for the next 24 hours. She can share this benefit with a number of allies equal to her Charisma bonus.

entries.name: Web (3 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon gains a pair of spinnerets, giving it the ability to spin webs. The eidolon can use these webs to support itself plus up to one creature of the same size. It can throw webbing as a ranged touch attack up to 8 times per day, entangling a creature up to one size larger than the eidolon. The webbing has a range of 50 feet and a 10-foot range increment. Creatures entangled by the web can escape with an Escape Artist check or a Strength check (at a 閳? penalty). The DC of these checks is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Con modifier. The webs have a Hardness of 0 and a number of hits points equal to the eidolon's total Hit Dice. The eidolon can climb its own webs at its climb speed and can pinpoint any creature touching its webs.

  The eidolon must possess the climb evolution to take this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 7th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Web (UC) (3 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 7th; daemon, demon, or protean subtype; climb evolution.

  The eidolon gains a pair of spinnerets, giving it the ability to spin webs. The eidolon can use these webs to support itself plus one creature of up to the same size. It can throw webbing as a ranged touch attack up to eight times per day, entangling a creature up to one size larger than the eidolon. The webbing has a range of 50 feet and a 10-foot range increment. Creatures entangled by the web can escape with a successful Escape Artist check, or with a Strength check at a 閳? penalty. The DC of these checks is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 Hit Dice + the eidolon閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier. The webs have a hardness of 0 and a number of hits points equal to the eidolon閳ユ獨 total Hit Dice.

  The eidolon can climb its own webs at its climb speed and can pinpoint the location of any creature touching its webs.

entries.name: Webbed Extremities
entries.description: An alchemist with this discovery grows membranes between his fingers and toes, greatly improving his movement underwater. The alchemist gains a +4 alchemical bonus on Swim checks and can take 10 on a Swim check even if distracted or endangered while swimming.

entries.name: Weighing Infusion
entries.description:
Element void; Type substance infusion; Level 2; Burn 2
Associated Blasts gravity, void
Saving Throw Reflex negates

  This infusion functions as entangling infusion, except it entangles and immobilizes a foe by increasing its weight, rather than surrounding it in elemental matter.

entries.name: Well-Known Expert
entries.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 social identity is known as an expert in numerous fields, including areas and topics the vigilante hasn閳ユ獩 actually taken the time to study. As a result the vigilante is skilled at encouraging others to discover solutions to difficult problems themselves by asking probing questions, while appearing to give the information himself.

In his social identity, the vigilante can take 10 when attempting to aid another on Appraise, Craft, and Knowledge checks. He also gains a bonus equal to half his class level (minimum +1) on Bluff checks to appear knowledgeable in Appraise, Craft (all), and Knowledge (all). If he has the renownUI social talent, he grants a +3 bonus when he successfully aids another on these skill checks, rather than +2.

In his area of renown, the vigilante閳ユ獨 social identity is so trusted as an expert that scholars are inspired to make amazing deductions and intuitive leaps in discussions with him. A creature that has already failed a Knowledge check on a specific subject can attempt one additional check to gain information on the same topic if it receives an aid another bonus from the vigilante when doing so.

entries.name: 通晓音律
entries.description: 2级以上的吟游诗人对于其他诗人的【吟游表演】，以及其他的音波效果都获得了一定的抵抗力。诗人在对抗其他诗人的吟游表演、音波效果、以及语言相关的效果的豁免检定中获得+4加值。

entries.name: Wet Coat
entries.description:
An alchemist with this discovery has conditioned his body so that it never completely dries out when on land. He effectively becomes immune to any detrimental effects of his water dependency. Only an alchemist with the aquatic subtype and the water dependency special quality can select this discovery.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Whimsical Prank
entries.description: As a standard action, you can call upon fey to play a prank on a creature within 30 feet as a dirty trick combat maneuver. Resolve this attempt as normal, except that it doesn閳ユ獩 provoke attacks of opportunity, you use your oracle level in place of your Combat Maneuver Bonus, and you add your Charisma modifier in place of your Strength or Dexterity modifier. No save is allowed against this attempt, but a creature affected by this revelation cannot be the target of this revelation again for 1 day.

entries.name: Whimsical Step
entries.description:
Once per day as a move action, you can teleport up to 10 feet per oracle level.

  You can use this ability once per day at 7th level and one additional time per day for every 4 levels beyond 7th.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: Whimsy Final Revelation
entries.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a fey trickster in the flesh. Your type changes to fey and you gain low-light vision, immunity to poison, and DR 10/ cold iron.

entries.name: Whimsy Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the whimsy mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Perform, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{妖火} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ofgzglphaotmwnw]{Shamefully Overdressed} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7rx66m98dwo18fy8]{强效幻影} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fv17a5jsmapb0wcz]{Entice Fey, Lesser} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.446vcsetq4ny904e]{假象术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b9klr16gssc2x0ab]{Entice Fey} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oq3mqv5vovjkoa2p]{迷舞} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6isran0p5phoru7x]{Entice Fey, Greater} (18th).

entries.name: Whimsy Subdomain
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pzwe3gxjz8gthyaj]{梦之衣}

entries.name: Whip Crack
entries.description: At 2nd level, the cavalier becomes proficient with a whip and gains Whip Mastery as a bonus feat. When a creature whose number of Hit Dice is less than or equal to 1/2 the cavalier閳ユ獨 level takes nonlethal damage from the cavalier閳ユ獨 whip, it is shaken for 1 round. This does not stack with other fear effects.

entries.name: Whip Hurricane Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 6; Burn 4
Prerequisite kinetic blade, kinetic whip, blade whirlwind
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  As blade whirlwind, except it manifests a kinetic whip, and the whip lasts until the beginning of your next turn or until you use any form infusion that creates a blade or whip again, whichever comes first.

entries.name: Whip of Vengeance
entries.description:
The vigilante gains Whip Mastery as a bonus feat. If he already has the Whip Mastery feat, he can immediately swap it for another feat he qualified for at the level when he chose Whip Mastery.

  In addition, if he is at least 6th level, he also gains the Improved Whip Mastery feat. He treats his vigilante level as his vigilante base attack bonus for the purpose of meeting prerequisites of feats and abilities that have Whip Mastery as a prerequisite.

entries.name: Whirlwind
entries.description: At 9th level, you gain the ability to turn into a 10-foot-high whirlwind once per day for 1 round per sorcerer level.

entries.name: Whirlwind Lesson
entries.description:
You can quickly browse through a magical tome or manual, gaining its benefits with only a single 8-hour study session (rather than the usual 48 hours over a period of 6 days).

  At 7th level, you may allow another character to join in your study; both of you gain the full benefit of having read the book.

  At 15th level, you may share your whirlwind lesson with a number of characters equal to your oracle level. The benefits to you are permanent, whereas your students gain the tome or manual's benefits for a number of days equal to your Charisma modifier but then forget what they have learned.

entries.name: Whisper of Ancients
entries.description:
The psychic can send her consciousness into the Astral Plane for a glimpse of synchronous information. While casting a linked divination spell, the psychic can spend 1 point from her phrenic pool to gain a +2 bonus on any associated skill check.

  She can spend 2 points from her phrenic pool to instead gain a +4 bonus.

entries.name: Whispered Glimpses
entries.description: The whispers of intrigue sing to you with glimpses of insight into others閳?presence and motives, granting you greater awareness than your own senses could manage. You can add your Charisma modifier instead of your Wisdom bonus on Perception and Sense Motive checks.

entries.name: 天花乱坠
entries.description: 到了8级，你可用标准动作将谎言在耳边重复千遍，30尺内敌人必须通过意志豁免否则将被你迷魂。此能力能使用的轮数为你牧师等级，不必连续。此能力取代邪恶领域的秽恶之镰能力。

entries.name: Whispering Leaves
entries.description:
Whenever the shaman is within 10 feet of a tree or undergrowth, she can cast whispering wind as a spell-like ability with a caster level equal to her shaman level. The targeted area must also contain trees or undergrowth, which relay the message in a gentle, rustling voice.

  At 8th level, the shaman can also listen to the targeted area as though she were using clairaudience/ clairvoyance for the 1 round during which the hex is delivering the message.

entries.name: Whispering Shadows
entries.description:
You can darken the shadows around you and cause them to hiss, confounding and distracting your enemies. As an immediate action, you can force a target within 30 feet to reroll a miss chance due to concealment or a saving throw against an illusion or necromancy spell. The target of this ability must keep the result of the second roll, even if it is worse than the original roll. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Touch of Darkness power of the Darkness Domain.

entries.name: 混元体
entries.description: 7级起，武僧可以治疗自身的伤口。他可以自丹田中耗去2点气以治疗等同于其武僧等级的伤害。

entries.name: Wholeness of Body (UC)
entries.description: A monk with this ki power can heal his own wounds as a standard action. By spending 2 points from his ki pool, he can heal an amount of damage equal to 1d8 + his monk level.

entries.name: Wild Arcana
